name: RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate
description: The RTCPeerConnection property onicecandidate property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the icecandidate event occurs on an RTCPeerConnection instance. This happens whenever the local ICE agent needs to deliver a message to the other peer through the signaling server.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
